title: No, Noida Has Not Actually Banned Namaz In All Parks
subtitle: Misleading headlines and viral posts on Twitter and Facebook suggest that the Noida police’s notice, which was sent to companies, warning them from allowing their Muslim employees to congregate to offer their Friday namaz prayers.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Misleading headlines and viral posts on Twitter and Facebook suggest that the Noida Police's notice, issued sometime in December, bans Muslims from offering namaz prayers across all parks in Noida.

"नोएडा के पार्कों में नमाज़ पढ़ने पर रोक, मुस्लिमों का सवाल- अब हम कहां जाएं? (Ban on reading namaz in Noida’s parks, Muslims ask “Where do we go now?”)
